blogPost.excerpt: Wyndly gives people with allergies lifelong relief. We ship you personalized oral allergy drops that train your immune system to beat your personal allergy triggers. With unlimited doctor access and at-home care, we’ve made allergy care convenient.
blogPost.body: Wyndly gives people with allergies lifelong relief. We ship you personalized oral allergy drops that train your immune system to beat your personal allergy triggers. With unlimited doctor access and at-home care, we’ve made allergy care convenient.
blogPost.title: Wyndly - Train your immune system to beat your allergies
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Wyndly让过敏症患者得到终生缓解。我们为您运送个性化的口服过敏滴剂，训练您的免疫系统来击败您个人的过敏触发器。通过无限制的医生访问和上门护理，我们让过敏护理变得更加方便。
localize.tagline: 训练您的免疫系统以击败您的过敏症

localize.description: Wyndly讓過敏症患者得到終生緩解。我們爲您運送個性化的口服過敏滴劑，訓練您的免疫系統來擊敗您個人的過敏觸發器。通過無限制的醫生訪問和上門護理，我們讓過敏護理變得更加方便。
localize.tagline: 訓練您的免疫系統以擊敗您的過敏症

previous.excerpt: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.
previous.title: Grok - Summarize Slack channels w/ GPT3

localize.description: 保持对Slack频道的关注，需要您的注意力和时间！让Grok利用GPT-3的强大功能进行理解。让Grok利用GPT-3的强大功能进行理解。按需、在每日摘要中或在加入频道时对任何 Slack 频道进行总结。
保持對Slack頻道的關注，需要您的注意力和時間！讓Grok利用GPT-3的強大功能進行理解。讓Grok利用GPT-3的強大功能進行理解。按需、在每日摘要中或在加入頻道時對任何 Slack 頻道進行總結。

next.excerpt: Instantly create a mockup for any website. Paste the page URL and instantly generate a wireframe image of the site or your favorite websites in full-page resolution (3000 x 2000 pixels) with the background color of your choice.
next.title: webshot - Instantly create a mockup for any website

localize.description: 即时为任何网站创建一个模拟图。粘贴页面URL，并立即生成网站或您最喜爱的网站的线框图像，全页分辨率（3000 x 2000像素），背景颜色由您选择。
localize.tagline: 即时为任何网站创建一个模拟图。

localize.description: 即時爲任何網站創建一個模擬圖。粘貼頁面URL，並立即生成網站或您最喜愛的網站的線框圖像，全頁分辨率（3000 x 2000像素），背景顏色由您選擇。
localize.tagline: 即時爲任何網站創建一個模擬圖。
